name: Ninja Legend:New Chapter
description:
Fight with Ninjutsu and strategies. Carry out different ways of the Ninja! Create and join various formations. Match the features of each character for more fantastic combats!

Ninjutsu Mystery, Unlimited combo.
Exquisite combat effects, with authentic Ninjutsu Mystery of each character. Skills assembly, release at will. Showdown at the critical moment.

Easy cultivation, Leisure gameplay.
Rich leisure gameplays with more fun! Easier cultivation to help you grow quickly in the game.

Multiplayer game, Strategies assistance.
You can cultivate and level up your allies. Set up different formations to guard your position in combat.

[Tips]
